name: Phil Barrett
title: Senior UX Designer
quote: I believe that the problems which we encounter are wicked problems, because we whack them with a digital bat and make people's lives safe

name: Alex
title: Senior UX Designer
quote: Design isn’t about solving problems. It’s about people. About making their lives better. Solving wicked problems is just one of the ways we make lives better.

name: Nelri Rossam
title: Senior UX Designer
quote: Be comfortable to stay with the problem. Revisit it and keep it in sight.
